 Accessibility



Our winter festivals are indoors and provide easy access to all abilities - however, there are steps for the access to the bars in the gym. Please contact us in advance so we can accomodate your needs.

There are fully accessible disabled toilets.

Assistance and service dogs are most welcome â€“ but please do take care, especially when the site is busy.

If you would like assistance at any point, please ask a volunteer who will be able to assist.

Please note that due to site restrictions we are unable to accomodate for disabled parking at the festival - please see the Travel Info page for more details.
